full_title: Never Let Go by Jung Kook (정국)
title: Never Let Go

description.plain:
“Never Let Go” by Jung Kook of BTS was released for the group’s annual debut anniversary celebration, also known to fans as “Festa.”

In this heartfelt song, Jungkook expresses the love and appreciation he has for his fans, ARMY. He describes them as people who have always supported and stayed with him.

The house rhythm track combines a minimal yet catchy synthesizer with refreshing instruments as he continuously urges his listeners to never let go. His sentiment is expressed through comforting repetition.

body.plain:
“Never Let Go” by Jung Kook of BTS was released for the group’s annual debut anniversary celebration, also known to fans as “Festa.”

In this heartfelt song, Jungkook expresses the love and appreciation he has for his fans, ARMY. He describes them as people who have always supported and stayed with him.

The house rhythm track combines a minimal yet catchy synthesizer with refreshing instruments as he continuously urges his listeners to never let go. His sentiment is expressed through comforting repetition.
